languages.text: "А тебе многое известно. Куда больше, чем положено обычно{mf|му|й} смертно{mf|му|й}. Да, я и впрямь терзал плоть врагов, чтобы извлечь тайны из горчащего вкуса их мяса".
"You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."
languages.original_text: "А тебе многое известно. Куда больше, чем положено обычно{mf|му|й} смертно{mf|му|й}. Да, я и впрямь терзал плоть врагов, чтобы извлечь тайны из горчащего вкуса их мяса".

traits.locale_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你的知识非常渊博，远远超出了普通凡人应有的水平。没错，我确实会大啖敌人的血肉，从他们血肉的味道中得知他们的秘密。”
languages.original_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."

traits.locale_text: “你的知识非常渊博，远远超出了普通凡人应有的水平。没错，我确实会大啖敌人的血肉，从他们血肉的味道中得知他们的秘密。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Está muy bien informad{mf|o|a}. Más de lo que debería estarlo cualquier mortal. Sí, es cierto que he consumido la carne de mis enemigos para extraer los secretos del sabor humeante de su carne».
languages.original_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."

traits.locale_text: «Está muy bien informad{mf|o|a}. Más de lo que debería estarlo cualquier mortal. Sí, es cierto que he consumido la carne de mis enemigos para extraer los secretos del sabor humeante de su carne».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「お前は物事をよく知っているな。普通の人間がそうであるべきよりも、はるかに。そう、俺は敵の肉を貪り食らい、その肉の噎せ返るような風味から秘密を刈り取った」
languages.original_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は物事をよく知っているな。普通の人間がそうであるべきよりも、はるかに。そう、俺は敵の肉を貪り食らい、その肉の噎せ返るような風味から秘密を刈り取った」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid bestens informiert. Deutlich besser als ein gewöhnlicher Sterblicher es sein sollte. Ja, es stimmt, dass ich mich am Fleisch meiner Feinde gelabt habe, um die Geheimnisse aus dem dampfenden Geschmack ihres Fleischs zu ernten."
languages.original_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid bestens informiert. Deutlich besser als ein gewöhnlicher Sterblicher es sein sollte. Ja, es stimmt, dass ich mich am Fleisch meiner Feinde gelabt habe, um die Geheimnisse aus dem dampfenden Geschmack ihres Fleischs zu ernten."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vous semblez maîtriser ce sujet. Bien plus que le commun des mortels ne le devrait. Oui, il est vrai que je dévore mes ennemis pour arracher leurs secrets par l'entremise savoureuse de leur chair. »
languages.original_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."

traits.locale_text: « Vous semblez maîtriser ce sujet. Bien plus que le commun des mortels ne le devrait. Oui, il est vrai que je dévore mes ennemis pour arracher leurs secrets par l'entremise savoureuse de leur chair. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."

languages.text: "Pek bilgilisin. Sıradan bir fâni bunları bilmez. Evet, düşmanlarımın lezzetli etindeki gizemleri öğrenmek için onları yediğim doğrudur."
languages.original_text: "You are very well informed. Far more than a common mortal ought to be. Yes, it is true that I have gorged on the flesh of my enemies to reap the secrets from the steaming flavour of their meat."

traits.locale_text: "Oldukça bilgilisin. Sıradan bir fâni bunları bilmez. Evet, düşmanlarımın lezzetli etindeki gizemleri öğrenmek için onları yediğim doğrudur."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
